body:
Hi,

Can you please list a few peer-reviewed journal and conference papers that deal directly or indirectly with the validation of Radiance? Probably Reinhardt and Walkenhorst in Energy and Buildings, and Mardaljevic in LR+T - any others? If you could list the details, I'd appreciate it - good to know for everybody.

Many thanks

Martin Moeck, Penn State
